channel.title: Oreo on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in Oreo on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: How The Cookie Crumbles
item.description: Today in Tedium: The Oreo cookie, tasty as it is, gets way too much attention from the public, in part because Nabisco is so good at marketing. That’s not to say that it doesn’t deserve at least some of it—certainly there’s much to be discussed about the cookie, including its fairly intricate ornamental design, which has largely remained unchanged since 1952, and its recent contest to decide a new cookie flavor.
